data: ~#FF00~Find a fast vehicle and get to the ~#FF0C~starting grid.
~#FF00~You need a vehicle to be in this race.
~#FF00~You have 1 second to find a vehicle.
~#FF00~You have ~#FEFE~ seconds to find a vehicle.
Press ~#FF28~ to return to the race board or ~#FF11~ to exit.
~#FF03~You retired.In order to infiltrate the 'Angels Of Death' for Lester - you will have to pass their initiation test posing as him.
Earn respect by riding with style through gang territory...
... and chase their arch rivals, 'The Lost', off their turf.
Perform a burnout to get the biker's attention, tap brake then slide to accelerate to initiate a burnout, then quickly release and press accelerate to boost off.
You need to be on foot in order to plant the bomb.
At the Angels of Death hangout
Go to the Angels of Death hangout.
You have until ~#FEFE~:~#FEFE~~#FEFE~ to impress the bikers. Get on Lester's ~#FF09~motorbike.
You need to use Lester's ~#FF09~bike ~#FF00~to impress the gang.
Perform a burnout to get the bikers' attention.
Ride with style through the A.O.D. ~#FF0C~turf.~#FF00~
Hit that ~#FF0C~ramp ~#FF00~and land in the gas station.
'The Lost' ~#FF03~biker gang ~#FF00~are on A.O.D. turf. Take them out.
Attack 'The Lost' ~#FF03~bikers, ~#FF00~but leave one alive to tell the tale.
Use the ~#FF0C~ramp ~#FF00~to jump into the park.
Meet up with Lester at the ~#FF0C~rendezvous ~#FF00~point.
'The Lost' are meeting in the park. Go to the ~#FF0C~Monoglobe.~#FF00~
Plant explosives at the ~#FF0C~base ~#FF00~of the Monoglobe.
Hurry up. You only have an hour left to impress the bikers.
Be careful - you're damaging your ride.
Watch out - the bike is almost wrecked.
Stay away from the bikers, or they'll realize you're not Lester.
Offload Lester's coke so he passes the A.O.D. initiation test.
You're supposed to stop near the ~#FF09~buyer.
A rival ~#FF03~dealer ~#FF00~is trying to steal your customers.
Your ~#FF03~rivals ~#FF00~are shifting more coke than you.
~#FF03~Your rivals shifted more coke than you.
Stop near the ~#FF09~buyer. ~#FF00~You can make the trade on foot or in a vehicle.A meeting with Lester
~#FF09~Lester ~#FF00~is picking up Meredith. Make sure they're both safe.
Follow ~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~, and look out for trouble.
Keep the ~#FF03~bikers ~#FF00~away from the apartments. Don't let them get inside.
Follow ~#FF09~Lester ~#FF00~while he takes Meredith somewhere else.
Look-out. ~#FF03~A.O.D. bikers ~#FF00~are approaching. They must not get inside the apartments.
Don't damage Lester's ~#FF09~car. ~#FF00~Meredith will suspect something's wrong.
Be careful. Your shooting will alert Meredith.
Make sure Lester gets Meredith safely to the apartments without her realizing the A.O.D. are after them.
Stop the bikers getting into the apartments - so Lester can safely pump Meredith for information.
Keep the bikers away from Lester as he drives Meredith to a new location.
Make sure no bikers are around to disturb Lester and Meredith.
Prevent the biker ratting out Lester and Meredith.
Take that ~#FF03~biker ~#FF00~down - he could alert reinforcements.
~#FF03~Bikers ~#FF00~are approaching. Make sure they don't get too close, or Meredith will suspect something.
~#FF00~You have received an email. Check your email now.~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~C'mon Huang!
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~We've gotta get this shit there today, man!
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~Are we gonna 'Huang' around here all day? ...Sorry. Really bad joke.
~#FF00~Meet up with the A.O.D. convoy at the pier.
~#FF00~Make sure the A.O.D. vans get back to their lockup intact.
~#FF00~Protect the ~#FF09~vans ~#FF00~in the convoy. Don't let any of them be destroyed.
~#FF00~You are too far away from the ~#FF09~vans. ~#FF00~Get closer.
~#FF00~The Lost have set up a roadblock.
~#FF00~The ~#FF09~vans ~#FF00~have stopped. Get nearer to find out why.
~#FF03~Your bike was destroyed.When you have a wanted level, law enforcement officers will try to arrest you.
As your wanted level increases the Law will try harder to take you down.
If you are arrested you will be taken to the nearest police precinct for processing.
The officers there will confiscate your weapons and take a cash bribe to release you.
If your health reaches zero, you will pass out and be taken to the nearest hospital for treatment.
Before they discharge you, hospital staff will bill you for health care.
You can heal yourself by collecting health pick-ups or eating food, and body armor will help to protect you.$~#FEFE~
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~Finally! I thought you were never gonna bring me that gear, Huang.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~It's nice to have my credibility doubted by a walking coronary in a gimp costume.
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~Besides, I've got to blend in with the Angels of Death - and they're bikers.
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~By looking like an idiot having an early mid-life crisis.
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~...Listen man, I'm trying to see if these fools are protecting your boss's rat.
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~The stuff you brought me will get me through the door, but I can't ride for shit.
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~You're going to have to pretend to be me and pass their initiation test.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~but I might just quickly need to gain a few pounds.
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~Relax, Adonis! If you wear my spare jacket, and ride my bike, those methhead deadbeats will never know.
In order to infiltrate the 'Angels Of Death' for Lester - you will have to pass their initiation test posing as him.
Earn respect by riding with style through gang territory...
... and chase their arch rivals, 'The Lost', off their turf.
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~You're doing good, baby! But these explosives will bring the house down once and for all.
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~With riding like that I'm in the gang for sure! Thanks, baby!
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~So, you got the gear I need?
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~...Hsin said you were about as useful as a cunt on a nun.
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~All I'm saying is, I need that shit if I'm gonna infiltrate that deadbeat gang.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Have another burger, fat boy. It's on its way.~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~Aw, man. I'm drunk and I'm fucked!
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~I've been partying hard with the Angels - digging for info on that FIB rat.
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~I was real discreet. I didn't give anything away. Stone cold.
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~The problem is I'm too shit-faced to complete the Angels' final initiation test.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~What the fuck is wrong with you?
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~They wanted me to prove I wasn't a narc, so I was smoking coke laced bong hits for two days.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~It's all gone. Now, take the Angels their drug money.
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~You're a life saver, baby! I'm gonna remember you in my will!
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Please don't. I'm going to want to forget we ever met.
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~Give me a fucking break. I thought my fucking heart was going to stop.
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~You've gotta sell their shit for me, buddy.
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~I'm middle aged, over weight and about to die of a coronary.~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~The Angels are coming for me and Meredith!
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~I'm guessing they think we're screwing around behind her man's back.
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~No reason. People can be so suspicious. Besides, it was only oral.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~You moronic cunt. I hope they gut you and roast you...
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~Give me a break. I'm a lonely divorcee and a hot chick starts blowing me - what would you do?
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~I'll keep the deadbeats off your backs. But move fast.
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~Of course. Shit. I'm starting to itch. I think that bitch gave me crabs.
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~The problem is, it's gonna be impossible to get the true rat...
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~...if Meredith finds out the gang's after us.~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~So, do the Angels of Death have a Fed rat?
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~I'm not sure... but the boss's girl likes to gossip...
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~The problem is, only the most respected guys can get near her.
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~That's why I've agreed to solve a serious problem for them.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~What the fuck have you signed me up for now, fat man?
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~Relax. All we gotta do is protect some gear the gang has coming in...
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~...then I can get Meredith's loose lips working on me ... I mean, for us.
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~We're gonna know real soon if there's a rat in this gang.. I'm a pro, baby. Seriously.
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~This is the product we're gonna protect.
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~Most of them have been freebasing for a week straight... You can shoot straight can't you?
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~I'll sit up front, you can ride shotgun from where you are.
~#FEF1~The Lost have set up a roadblock.
~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~With this in the bag I'll get close to Meredith and get her talking.

~#FF09~Lester~#FF00~~n~No one. I think they were all just paranoid.~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~The assassins that took your silly sword are in all probability some Korean gang bangers, members of the Midtown Gangsters.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Those Koreans have been loyal to our family for years.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~They don't want to be Triad bitches no more.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~...and their assassins are gonna make sure they get it.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~...and disrupt his relationship with your uncle.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~And, in order to upset them right back, I've planted some smack...
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~...from a little personal stash I keep, in one of their cars.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Your personal stash of smack? You're a junkie?
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~No. I'm not a junkie, I'm a hypocrite...
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~...which is much worse. I only use on weekends, usually.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~Hey, walk a mile in my shoes, buddy. I don't need your shit.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~If we're gonna draw out these Korean assassins, make sure the LCPD busts that car.
~#FEF1~Parking contractors are towing away the Korean's car!
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~...if we are going to find out what the fuck is wrong with those Koreans...
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~...we're going to need some proper information.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~...None of my contacts know shit about them. We need to put a bug inside a gang-house.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Maybe I should just walk up and ask one of them to let me in and plant it?
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~I'm the one planting the bug, tough guy.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~I just need you to keep those low-lifes out of my hair for a while.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~You're insane! ...Why take such a big risk?
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~Because IAD are gonna shut me down unless I deliver a big collar.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~I'm a good cop, but I've been doing bad shit ever since...
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~Never mind. Enough of my annoying anecdotes. Just create a diversion, Huang...
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~...and make sure it's a big one!
~#FF00~Destroy one of the Koreans' cars to get their attention.~#FF00~Your quarry is meeting an Underboss in his gang.
~#FF00~Another meeting with an Underboss is taking place.
~#FF00~He's groveling to yet another gang Underboss.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~Well, you made it in the end. Don't worry about me.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~I'm just climbing the wall here. I've scratched myself raw all over.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Nice! It's real family fun hanging out with you, Heston. I'm glad I'm not a tax payer.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~Kid, keep up the patronizing tone. Really sympathetic of you. I'm a good cop, sometimes.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~Anyway, the next time I want a morality lesson...
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~...from the son of a dead gangster, remind me to ask for one.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~Talking of tax dollars, the LCPD just put some to good use...
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~...by releasing that Korean with a fucking caution.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~Man, if they'd found even half that amount of drugs in my car, I'd lose my pension!
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~In this country, only the President can boast about getting high.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~They'd let you off without even a slapped wrist... Are you shitting me?
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~Not me. Internal Affairs are kicking my ass day and night.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~They don't seem to appreciate that to get results you've got to bend the rules a little.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~Tough cop goes it alone... that's me.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Absolutely. Exactly how I would describe you. What are we going to do about that Korean prick?
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~Well, he's gonna have to 'explain' himself to all his Underbosses for getting arrested.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~Why don't you follow him and introduce yourself to all of them?
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~If that doesn't get their attention, I don't know what will.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~You wanna catch the big fish, you gotta put a worm on the line.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~...No offense, Huang. I just always wanted to use that line.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~Now, talking of lines, give me that coke and get out of here.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~I don't know: In your coke dealer's bag, maybe?
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~Listen kid, in this partnership I'm the senior guy. If I say I want something you better bring it.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~Let me remind you - we're supposed to be helping each other out here.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~For fuck's sake! Quit your whining. I'll get your coke.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Hold onto what's left of your nose, I might be a while.~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~...Heston?
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Where's Yu Jian? Where's my father's sword? Come on. Speak. I need that fucking sword.
~#FF09~Assassin~#FF00~~n~Interesting question. And if I wasn't dying, maybe you could torture me and find out.
~#FF09~Assassin~#FF00~~n~But, as I am dying, I can happily tell you to go fuck yourself.
~#FF06~Heston~#FF00~~n~Nice one, Huang! You killed our only lead!
~#FF06~Heston~#FF00~~n~Yes, and what better way to avenge him than to kill a low level gang banger...
~#FF06~Heston~#FF00~~n~...letting the boss go free? Without a lead we'll never find their boss!
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~All you care about is making your bust...
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~...so you can save your ass from IAD.
~#FF06~Heston~#FF00~~n~I want THIS Bust! ... You screwed up, Huang.
~#FF0C~Assassin~#FF00~~n~Keep back! I'm warning you! I'll kill him if you don't let me go!
~#FF0C~Assassin~#FF00~~n~I'm happy to kill him, man! Very happy!
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Well, you picked a fine time to O.D., dumbass.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~Oh, you're killing me with the humor.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~Why don't you try one of your lame gags on this guy, and get me the fuck out of here?
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~Take the bastard from a distance, Huang!~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~My eagerly talking friend at the FIB has an illegal wiretap...
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~If we fix it for him, he'll give us the name of their rat.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Fuck that, friend! You're wasting my time.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Hsin already thinks I'M the Fed rat. And you want me to work for them?
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~...How's it gonna look if your uncle finds out you've been working with me - a 'cop'?
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~It would look bad until I killed you, you piece of shit.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~You're not the only one under pressure, Huang.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~I'm going cold turkey while IAD are all over me, but I'm still doing the right thing.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~You do the right thing: Destroy the scrambler that's screwing with the Fed's wiretap
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~...then your life, and mine, can start getting back to normal.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~You must think I'm a moron.~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~So, what's this legally 'sensitive' job, Heston?
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~We need to sink Zhou Ming's contraband boat for him.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Are you insane? Or back to skag?
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~If I'm caught attacking Triad shipments, my life is over!
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~Well, tough shit, tough guy. My life fell apart years ago thanks to that Wonsu rat bastard!
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~By the way, who the fuck is the Wonsu?
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~That's what that inner circle of Koreans call themselves.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~That's my business. Yours is sinking that boat.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~And, if you want to keep playing happy families with your Triad friends,
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~I guess you'd better make sure no one aboard lives to tell tales on you.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Thank you. Why the fuck do you expect me to know all the terminology? Racist idiot.

~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~And this isn't just about landing a big bust to get IAD off your back, is it?~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~IAD took my car - that's a big problem for me - there were certain things I should have got rid of in that car.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~Things that will take other people down. You've gotta get it back before my fucking squad catches up with it.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~Some of the evidence will implicate them.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~When they catch up with my car they are gonna blow it to kingdom come.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Okay, and that's a bad thing why?
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~Well, the car belonged to my wife, god rest her...
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~I love that car! I don't want a scratch on it!
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~I'm not your valet, FRIEND, I'm not doing this again.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~You don't know what this means to me, Huang ... this car was the last thing my wife bought me before she...
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~Before she fucked my best friend! There, I said it.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~...you don't want your squad snatching your car back from IAD?
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~Exactly. I'm so fucked, I don't want help from my best friends.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Last time we spoke, you were divorced, now you're a widower. Heston - I think you just might be full of shit.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~I'll get you your car, and then you and I will have words.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~I'm a loser, and that's why I'm a drug addict, now, give me that fucking car. I'll be in touch.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~You're back on the drugs, aren't you?

~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~No way! I'm clean and serene. And you know what? I forgive you. Step 8! Step fucking 8, buddy.~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~So, you've got a real lead, or do you just want me to do your dirty work?
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~In time, Huang. First, if I'm gonna stay ahead of IAD, I'm gonna need to get off the coke, the heroin...
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~...and all the other shit - only, my dealer won't let one of his best customers go so easy.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~He's got 'evidence' against me going way back...
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~...and he's threatening he'll hand it all to IAD today unless I keep buying.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~They're already breathing hard down my neck - this would bury me.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Why don't your buddies help you out?
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~All they care about is their cut. Look, you owe me, Huang!
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~IAD would be off my back already if it hadn't been for you.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~I'll find your dealer and make sure his evidence meets a fitting end.
~#FF00~There goes Heston's dealer now. Looks like he's in a hurry.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~I'm not sure how you figure that out, my friend. I know - it's tough being a cop.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~You have to give out parking tickets and you get to shoot people. Boo hoo.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~But you clean up your act. You're revolting.~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~Before my contact was fingered by Internal Affairs...
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~...he told me our rat's ID is on an encrypted file in the FIB mainframe.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~You're gonna have to hack in, steal that file, and then cover your tracks before sending it to me.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~Then I sell the movie rights and we all get famous, but we don't sell out...
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~When the dust settles maybe we can think about revenge.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~Then I bust a major underworld player...
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~...look like a hero, and IAD goes away.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~...we remain true to ourselves and we make something of ourselves.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~You look like someone shat in your bed... what's wrong?
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~The Feds have been speaking to two guys: Chan and Zhou.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~They've been selling each other, and Hsin, to the FIB separately.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~So, what do we do? Whack both the shits?
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~You take the file to your uncle - it's what he needs to get back in with Hsin.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~Me - I'm giving up and getting out before IAD finally nail me.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~I ain't going to get that bust. I guess I should start negotiating with internal affairs.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~One of them has to be the Wonsu Boss...
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~And one of them may have ordered the hit...
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~...on my father and stole that fucking sword?
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~Not me. I'm done. This is too much of a mess.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~I guess the biopic will have to wait for your ego to return?~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~This is the plant's control room. I should be able to get the gates open from in there.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~IAD are right on my ass. We don't have much time.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~I thought you'd given up on this game and were retiring?
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~So did I ... but, I told you already, I've got my reason.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~...You never told me what it was.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~...My wife ... Before I screwed up my career, this guy's assassins trailed my car and tried to kill me.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~Only, it wasn't me in the car...
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~Okay, it's bullshit, but it sounded good. I'll put that in the movie script.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~...C'mon. My lying FIB contact is meeting up...
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~...with the real Wonsu boss at the desalinization plant. Let's get over there.
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~There they are! The Assassin's boss and my FIB contact!
~#FF06~Kenny~#FF00~~n~Huang... I... I can explain. I know it looks bad, but...
~#FF09~Heston~#FF00~~n~Don't even try to lie your way out of this, asshole!

Kenny has sent some hired muscle to help you route Chan from his hiding place.
~#FF09~Chan~#FF00~~n~Sure, I can be a little hot headed and foolish, but I'm a good guy.
~#FF09~Chan~#FF00~~n~I help people. I like animals and flowers.
~#FF09~Chan~#FF00~~n~Yesterday I made a video of some young female gymnasts...
~#FF09~Chan~#FF00~~n~...showering and it was ... beautiful.~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~My father is dead: murdered in Kowloon.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~He always told me that this life, the life of a gangster, can be short, even for a boss.

~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Regardless - I have sworn on his grave to find those responsible, to avenge him.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~I did this mostly so as to guarantee my inheritance, but also because the old man was a good guy...
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~'Yu Jian' - his sword, generations old, has always been in the keeping of the head of the family.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~A tradition my father invented after winning the sword in a card game.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Now, I've got to deliver the stupid thing to the family's new patriarch...
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~...Uncle Wu 'Kenny' Lee, in that great American melting pot Liberty City.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~The last time I visited Liberty City, I caught crabs off a Swiss tourist.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Still, even a pampered little snot like me shouldn't be able to bungle delivering a sword...
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~...to a moody and power crazy uncle...
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~...with a penchant for exotic pornography and impersonating people out of kung fu films.
~#FEF1~Sometimes though, even the simplest of jobs don't work out quite the way you expect them to...
~#FF09~Bodyguard~#FF00~~n~Your uncle sent us to meet you.

~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~This must be the famous American welcome I've heard so much about.
~#FF09~Smart-ass Assassin~#FF00~~n~...Well, he certainly looks it. He's got blood coming out of a bullet wound on his head.

~#FF06~Unsure Assassin~#FF00~~n~Check him. Fucking smart ass prick.

~#FF09~Smart-ass Assassin~#FF00~~n~He's not moving. He's not breathing. He's got a bullet wound to the head.
~#FF09~Smart-ass Assassin~#FF00~~n~You know what, I'm gonna stake my reputation on this one. The kid is dead.

~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~...I might actually get out of this madness alive...

~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~...As soon as they stop the car, I'll make my move...

You have found the Spanish Lord's warehouse.~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~My dear Nephew! I'm screwed!

You can also lose your wanted level by using Pay 'n' Sprays, as long as no cops see your vehicle enter the garage.
The mechanics will repair and respray your vehicle, which takes 3 hours and costs $200.
Pay 'n' Sprays can be found all over Liberty City, their locations are represented by a ~#FF09~~#FF19~ ~#FF00~icon on your GPS.

If a cop sees you commit a crime you will get a wanted level, indicated by a yellow star.
The more stars you have, the harder the cops will try to take you down.
You can disable pursuing cop cars by causing them to crash, or by ramming them at speed.
As you shake off more cops, your wanted stars will start to dim.
When you only have one wanted star, hide. Try and make the chasing police lose sight of you.

~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~I know. I cannot believe Ling's dead. First my dad, now this.
~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~...but I was talking about being attacked by nobodies. The shame of it!
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~What? ...How can you be so cold? Ling was a nice person.
~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~Boo fucking hoo. Stop acting like a child. People die every day.
~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~It's the nature of this life we've all chosen.
~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~We mustn't allow death to distract us from our purpose.
~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~And now some impudent street gang thinks they can just take it away from me?
~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~Make them pay for their arrogance, Huang.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~I'm finishing what I started in Cerveza Heights.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~No one fucks with my family.~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~Hsin's idiot son, Chan Jaoming, has had the audacity...
~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~...the impudence, the outright insanity of asking me to work for him.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Great! This could help you regain face with Hsin.
~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~Yes, but there's not much honor in wiping Chan's ass.
~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~I could never lower myself to be his lackey...
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~...think so highly of me, kind Uncle.
~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~...I'm sorry, Huang. Sorry I can't offer you better! Sorry I'm not the big boss!
~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~Sorry no one is here with a silver spoon ready to shove it up your pampered ass.
~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~Your father, rest his soul, ruined you!
~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~Chan needs to acquire some fast cars for a street race.
~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~Now believe me, Chan is mentally subnormal...
~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~...so the thought of him driving fast is somewhat worrying, but he seems to need them.
~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~The deadline for delivery was yesterday, so you'd better hurry.
~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~And Huang, thank you.~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~So, that fucking sword was stolen by a secret group within the Koreans...
~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~In that case, you were right to attack them, Huang.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Their boss's still out there ... he could be anyone.
~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~Not anyone: he had Yu Jian stolen specifically to embarrass and stop me succeeding Hsin. Asshole.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~So, whoever this guy is, he's benefited from your loss in standing with the boss?
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~And let's be honest, Uncle, you look like a bit of a prick right now.
~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~I wouldn't say prick, I'd say, tough, noble, warrior fallen on hard times, but I won't labor the point ...
~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~so, we would be wise to watch Chan and Zhou closely from now on.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Do you think one of them is preparing to whack Hsin?
~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~...I don't know, but we should get back on good terms with that stupid old bastard.
~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~He's been asking me to help his wonderful mob 'friends' bring a boat full of merchandise into the city.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~This is the best boat Triad money can buy?
~#FF09~Mobster~#FF00~~n~Hey, our Chinese delivery boy made it. I hope you got extra duck sauce.
~#FF09~Mobster~#FF00~~n~You think I'm funny? Like a clown? You think I'm a joke?
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~I saw that film too, you cretin.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Now shut up and give me the gear, or I'll show you what I think about clowns.
~#FF09~Mobster~#FF00~~n~Okay. Okay. Jeez - take it easy. Tight ass prick.
~#FF09~Mobster~#FF00~~n~Say thanks to Hsin, but we'll take it from here, noodle-boy.
~#FF09~Coast Guard~#FF00~~n~You in the boat - you are under arrest! ...We aren't kidding around, Mister!~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~It's all there in the file, Uncle: Zhou and Chan are the Fed rats.
~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~What a predictable twist in the plot! We must get this file to Hsin as quickly as possible.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~That's going to be rather difficult, now that he wants me dead.
~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~Because I spoke up for you, Hsin now believes...
~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~...I'm as guilty as you. As if I could be a rat?
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~An English friend of mine had a good word for people like him - that word was 'wanker'.
~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~This is no time for idle conjecture. It's time for a close up on me looking moody...
~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~He's meeting with the heads of the Tongs today...
~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~...it's the perfect time to give him the file...
~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~...how he will react when he reads it.
~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~Come on. I've my car. I'll drive.
~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~The FIB report is genuine Hsin ... there is no doubt.
~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~I know it's hard to see it in black and white.
~#FF06~Hsin~#FF00~~n~Zhou and Chan! My most trusted... My own son...
~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~I am ... sorry to bring you this news. But there're always others...
~#FF06~Hsin~#FF00~~n~Nonsense! I taught them to be ruthless, to give no ground ...
~#FF06~Hsin~#FF00~~n~I know my own oath to the Tongs!
~#FF06~Hsin~#FF00~~n~The traitors must die ... 'no matter who they are'.
~#FF06~Hsin~#FF00~~n~I pass to you, Wu Kenny Lee.
~#FF06~Hsin~#FF00~~n~You will be my successor... I retire henceforth.
~#FF06~Hsin~#FF00~~n~Enjoy yourself. I'm off to Macau to sleep with women of easy virtue.
~#FF09~Kenny~#FF00~~n~You drive. I can't handle a stick shift.~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Hsin?
~#FF09~Hsin~#FF00~~n~Lucky for you, you made it just in time to meet the inbound train.
~#FF09~Hsin~#FF00~~n~Follow him. He should be heading for their safehouse.
~#FF09~Hsin~#FF00~~n~Once I know its location, I will give you further instruction.
~#FF09~Quarry~#FF00~~n~Some guy was following me, but I think I lost him.
~#FF06~Contact~#FF00~~n~Maybe he was just cruising... That's understandable with you carrying that fucking umbrella.
~#FF06~Contact~#FF00~~n~Come on, let's get out of here. Fucking idiot.
~#FF00~The Korean has reached his destination: This must be the Midtown Gangsters' main safehouse.
~#FF09~Hsin~#FF00~~n~One of those rebellious little pricks is coming in on that train.

~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Thanks. And may I say, I love the patronizing old turd act you've got going on.~#FF09~Chen~#FF00~~n~Hsin has given us the authority to do 'whatever it takes' to get those files...
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~'Whatever it takes'? Why don't we just ask to see them?
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~They are supposed to be loyal to Hsin, right? Nobody needs to get hurt.
~#FF09~Chen~#FF00~~n~I wonder why Hsin thinks you're the rat? You're more like the village idiot.
~#FF09~Chen~#FF00~~n~Come on, let's go and pick up some toys.
~#FF09~Chen~#FF00~~n~Seems you're not mentioned in the files Huang. Hsin will be disappointed.
~#FF09~Chen~#FF00~~n~You can go, but remember... we'll be watching you.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~You're a dick. You know that? A dick.~#FF09~Hsin~#FF00~~n~The underhand dogs' weapons shipment is arriving right now.
~#FF09~Hsin~#FF00~~n~I cannot allow a subordinate gang to stockpile heavy weapons they might use against us.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Sometimes, the hardest thing about being a parent is letting go.
~#FF09~Hsin~#FF00~~n~Destroy their weapons and all those involved ... if you can.
The Korean gangbangers are escaping on that boat with their weapons.
~#FF09~Hsin~#FF00~~n~It makes my blood boil and my power of metaphor reach breaking point.
~#FF09~Hsin~#FF00~~n~Shut your fucking mouth, you little cunt.~#FF09~Hsin~#FF00~~n~Though that gang of Koreans isn't speaking to the Feds...
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Let me guess...you want me to go and blow some shit up...
~#FF09~Hsin~#FF00~~n~Err, yes ...I've left some explosives around the back of the building.
~#FF09~Hsin~#FF00~~n~... and though I grow weary waiting for my sword, I may allow you further time to find it.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~...in a subtle but powerful statement of your authority?

~#FF09~Hsin~#FF00~~n~And Huang, I hope it goes without saying, but fuck this up, and I will fuck you up.~#FF09~D'Avanzo~#FF00~~n~I know our people don't usually get along, but things have gotta change if we're all gonna survive.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~I'm deeply touched that you care about the Triads, Mr. D'Avanzo, but I just need the rat's name.
~#FF09~D'Avanzo~#FF00~~n~Listen, once this rat's put you lot inside...
~#FF09~D'Avanzo~#FF00~~n~...he's gonna start doing the same thing to us.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~So, just give me his name and we can all live happily ever after.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Apart from him, of course. He'll live not so happily for not that long.
~#FF09~D'Avanzo~#FF00~~n~We've gotta be real careful. I think he's onto me...
~#FF09~D'Avanzo~#FF00~~n~His men could be here any minute looking for me.
~#FF09~D'Avanzo~#FF00~~n~... Jimmy Capra - a Messina made man - the same guy who's currently being real friendly with your boss.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~So how come YOU don't take him out?
~#FF09~D'Avanzo~#FF00~~n~The Messinas and my people have been enemies for years.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~...But a Triad could - now that we're all buddies - right?
~#FF09~D'Avanzo~#FF00~~n~You're a fucking natural. This is gonna work out just fine.~#FF09~D'Avanzo~#FF00~~n~We hid a digital recorder in Jimmy Capra's car.
~#FF09~D'Avanzo~#FF00~~n~By now it'll be full of evidence proving he's the Feds' rat ...and probably a cross-dresser too.
~#FF09~D'Avanzo~#FF00~~n~We need that recorder, so we're gonna need his car, and you're the perfect guy to steal it.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Capra might be friendly with the Triads...
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~...aren't going to let me just steal his car.
~#FF09~D'Avanzo~#FF00~~n~Of course not! They're not going to let ANYONE take it!
~#FF09~D'Avanzo~#FF00~~n~But, an eggroll like you - no offense - can get closer to it than any of my guys.
~#FF09~D'Avanzo~#FF00~~n~It should be parked over at the Messina's Boulevard compound ...Lots of luck.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Why didn't you plant a bug like a normal person? I thought you were a wise guy?
~#FF09~D'Avanzo~#FF00~~n~And I thought you were bringing me take out. Because they sweep for radio signals, genius.
~#FF09~D'Avanzo~#FF00~~n~Good job. Once we've dug the digital recorder out of this piece of shit, I'll be in touch.~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Have you got the copy of that recording ... for my boss.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~The one that proves Capra is the Fed rat.
~#FF09~D'Avanzo~#FF00~~n~Oh, that one. Relax! As soon as we're done...
~#FF09~D'Avanzo~#FF00~~n~Capra wants to meet me for peace talks. But, the only peace I'm gonna give him is 'rest in peace'!
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Cool pun! I bet you've been working on that all day.
~#FF09~D'Avanzo~#FF00~~n~And I want you there, making sure the right guy gets shot.
~#FF09~D'Avanzo~#FF00~~n~The meeting's just between me and Capra: I should be able to handle him...
~#FF09~D'Avanzo~#FF00~~n~....but there's a sniper rifle on the roof for you...
~#FF09~D'Avanzo~#FF00~~n~...just in case things turn a little sour.
~#FF09~D'Avanzo~#FF00~~n~Hey, Capra! ...Where are you? I hope you came alone like we agreed.
~#FF06~Capra~#FF00~~n~Of course I did, Rudy - you know me - I'm a man of honor.
~#FF09~D'Avanzo~#FF00~~n~Must be nice to have that luxury...
~#FF09~D'Avanzo~#FF00~~n~...they can write that on your tombstone.
~#FF09~D'Avanzo~#FF00~~n~Hey! What are these fucks doing here?
~#FF06~Capra~#FF00~~n~Maybe you should plan your own obituary first, friend.~#FF09~D'Avanzo~#FF00~~n~You did great. The recording from Capra's car proves he's been talking to the Feds. A lot.
~#FF09~D'Avanzo~#FF00~~n~Why? You don't trust me? I'm telling you what it says.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Trust? In this town? Don't be ridiculous.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~I need to clear things with my boss.
~#FF09~D'Avanzo~#FF00~~n~Sure, I'll get you a copy of it, little man ...
~#FF09~D'Avanzo~#FF00~~n~just as soon as you've whacked all the rats named on it.~#FF09~Mel~#FF00~~n~Well, if it isn't the star of my show!
~#FF09~Mel~#FF00~~n~Chan's given you to me as my guide and protector - a knowing Virgil to my innocent Dante - as I chart the corrupting pit of hell you methnecks live in.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~It's good to see unprejudiced reporting isn't dead.
~#FF09~Mel~#FF00~~n~I'm sorry if the truth hurts, but integrity and impartiality - the truth and nothing but - are how I roll.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Sure. I predict a bright future for you at the networks.
~#FF09~Mel~#FF00~~n~Like I need career critique from a professional criminal.
~#FF09~Mel~#FF00~~n~Come on. Let's get to the docks. Chan's got a huge shipment of drugs arriving.
~#FF09~Mel~#FF00~~n~I want to get close to the action, and shoot my first footage.
~#FF09~Mel~#FF00~~n~You drive. I'm gonna get my cameras ready.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~I'm gonna take a look and make sure everything's cool.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~No. I don't know what line Chan fed you, but if these guys see you filming them - you're dead.
~#FF09~Mel~#FF00~~n~Chan said I could shoot anything I wanted!
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Take a camera in there and you'll be the one getting shot. Chan would be pretty pissed if that happened.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Well, I do. Don't get me wrong it's not you I'm thinking about.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Look, shoot your footage from inside the van.
~#FF09~Mel~#FF00~~n~This is pointless! ...Okay! Okay! I'll stay in the van... I promise.
~#FF09~Mel~#FF00~~n~Oh, my God! You killed those guys... I can't believe it.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~What did you expect? It's not like I'm gonna call the cops.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~"Help! Police! Our massive illicit drug shipment is being ripped off!"
~#FF09~Mel~#FF00~~n~Funny. Well, laugh this one up: I did call the cops.
~#FF09~Mel~#FF00~~n~Well, what did you expect me to do? I was crapping myself!
~#FF09~Mel~#FF00~~n~Hey! You were supposed to be protecting me while I was filming!
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~I was kinda busy - maybe you noticed!
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Look, if you wanna keep that footage, you'd better get out of here before your cops arrive.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Go!~#FF09~Mel~#FF00~~n~I wasn't sure I'd see you again.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Don't get all teary-eyed. I'm here because Chan's paying.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Exactly. So, you won't need to call the cops this time.
~#FF09~Mel~#FF00~~n~I need to get some footage of a drug factory.
~#FF09~Mel~#FF00~~n~Chan won't let me see any of his, but he's told me about this place run by the Yardies.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~He won't let you see any of his factories because the moron doesn't have any. So instead, he wants me to walk you through a rival's factory.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Maybe I could do a full media presentation mid way through, pointing out the profitable operating principles of the place...
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~...whilst dodging bullets, using a laser pointer to distract crazed Yardies.
~#FF09~Mel~#FF00~~n~Actually, I think his plan was for you to tear the place apart while I filmed it.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Hey! I thought I was the one who's supposed to charge in shooting wildly. Heh! Heh!
~#FF09~Mel~#FF00~~n~Oh, please! Is this really the time for levity? People are about to die.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Only of we go through this door. Of course you wouldn't get your footage if we didn't.
~#FF09~Mel~#FF00~~n~...Can't you just shoot the guns out of their hands?
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~I find the best way to make someone drop their gun is to shoot them in the head.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~So, try to keep out of my way in there, it's gonna get really messy.
~#FF09~Mel~#FF00~~n~This is awful! They weren't gangsters. They were probably forced to work here...How can you live with yourself?
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Will you give me a break? You got your footage didn't you?
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Then let me do mine! Move out of the way. I'm going to open the safe.
~#FF09~Mel~#FF00~~n~...Hey, I recognize that dead guy. It's Vince Vacant, Channel 15's ace investigative reporter.
~#FF09~Mel~#FF00~~n~He must have been doing an undercover piece on this place...
~#FF09~Mel~#FF00~~n~Oh, my God! You know what this means?
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~You filmed yourself aiding and abetting a known killer?
~#FF09~Mel~#FF00~~n~...There's gonna be an opening at Channel 15! This is great!
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~Let's get out of here.~#FF06~Xai~#FF00~~n~Listen, Chan just came into possession of a fuck load of this new shit.
~#FF06~Xai~#FF00~~n~It's highly addictive and more toxic than the Humboldt at high tide...
~#FF06~Xai~#FF00~~n~...so don't be surprised if you get chased round by street crazies screaming for more.
~#FF06~Xai~#FF00~~n~Toss some of this shit out to the usual junkies and crack whores and see what sticks.
~#FF09~Mel~#FF00~~n~Highly addictive and toxic? Nice... and this is the stuff you're gonna 'market' to unsuspecting people?
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~It's their choice. I'm not going to force it on anyone.
~#FF09~Mel~#FF00~~n~Choice? You're aiming it at crack whores and junkies! Seriously, doesn't any of this bother you?
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~As long as it pays, I'm only too happy to help the self destructive achieve their ambitions. Come on, let's get moving.
~#FF09~Mel~#FF00~~n~Fun? Only a greedy, self-centered, sociopath would think any of that was fun.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~I'll take that as a yes then.
~#FF09~Mel~#FF00~~n~How dare you? There's no comparison between us, maniac!
~#FF09~Mel~#FF00~~n~You're destroying decent society for respectable people. My job, my calling, is to show your kind up as the monsters you are.
~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~...Gaining fame, fortune, and having fun, doing it.
~#FF09~Mel~#FF00~~n~Fuck you, killer! I'll fucking show you!Ped Splat!

~#FF09~Zhou~#FF00~~n~I'll drive from here on in. You sneak onto that delivery truck, and toss its merchandise over to me.

~#FF09~Noh~#FF00~~n~No. Fuck off, kid. Come back when you've got the stuff Zhou asked for.~#FF09~Zhou~#FF00~~n~In his final months as boss, Hsin Jaoming is losing the respect...
~#FF09~Zhou~#FF00~~n~...of several major business associates and dealers.
~#FF09~Zhou~#FF00~~n~Their obedience to our leader should be absolute.
~#FF09~Zhou~#FF00~~n~To bring them back in line, Hsin is going to blow up the vehicles...

~#FF09~Zhou~#FF00~~n~...as the only competent operator. It's win-win.
~#FF09~Zhou~#FF00~~n~My cars now ... and my drugs too.~#FF09~Zhou~#FF00~~n~Even though we have disciplined the dealers who insulted Hsin with their disrespect,
~#FF09~Zhou~#FF00~~n~for justice to be truly done, they must be taught a more serious lesson.

~#FF09~Zhou~#FF00~~n~and they refused and threatened to run to Hsin and start bitching and moaning like women,
~#FF09~Zhou~#FF00~~n~so the fuckers are going to have to be shut up.
~#FF09~Zhou~#FF00~~n~Yet again I have delivered Hsin's justice...like an avenging angel, or indomitable god...
~#FF09~Zhou~#FF00~~n~...or something else a bit like that.
~#FF09~Zhou~#FF00~~n~But, as usual, I get treated like a fucking butler.

~#FF0C~Huang~#FF00~~n~That must be some good coke.~#FF09~Zhou~#FF00~~n~Back so soon? ...You must be eager to help make me the new boss.

~#FF09~Zhou~#FF00~~n~...you have shown some talent today... And for that, I nearly admire you. Thank you.~#FF09~Zhou~#FF00~~n~Ah, my little friend. Isn't it wonderful? While other Triads grow in infamy, I grow in fame.

~#FF09~Zhou~#FF00~~n~...please, do me a little favor, and get the fuck out of here. Thank you.~#FF09~Zhou~#FF00~~n~The morons I employ as charity to their families...

tip-offHuang,~n~ Meredith, the boss's girl I told you about, is giving me plenty of attention - but she hasn't mentioned a rat yet.~n~ If I'm gonna get what we need, I'm gonna need you to provide a smoke screen.~n~ ~n~ See you soon, baby.~n~ ~n~ Lester ~n~ * * * * * * * * * * * * * *~n~ Need a Private Investigator? Call 555-80085 and ease that suspicious mind.~n~

Huang,~n~ I got everything I could from Meredith - in fact, more than I bargained for. Hep C, scabies, a deep seated sense of insecurity and the truth about the Angels of Death.~n~ Suffice to say, there's no Fed informer in the gang: they're clean, which is more than I can say for Meredith.~n~ ~n~ I enjoyed working with you Huang. You're a good kid. If ever you need an old sea dog to go on adventures with and tell you about the world in an unlikely but heart warming buddy flick kind of way, I'm your man. Now get out of here before I shed a manly tear.~n~ ~n~ Lester~n~ ~n~ * * * * * * * * * * * * * *~n~ Need a Private Investigator? Call 555-80085 and ease that suspicious mind.~n~

Huang,~n~ All that shooting is making Meredith nervous. She's stoned but says it's ruining her high. She's also really annoying me and definitely gave me some exotic form of the clap. I'm peeing blue. It sounds like world war three out there, man. Please. Calm it down.~n~ ~n~ I'm gonna move us some place else. Keep those biker fools off our tails.~n~ ~n~ Lester~n~ ~n~ * * * * * * * * * * * * * *~n~ Need a Private Investigator? Call 555-80085 and ease that suspicious mind.~n~

Huang,~n~ We did it, baby! I'm in the gang!~n~ I've been asking some real probing questions about a possible Fed rat in the gang. Probing, but subtle of course.~n~ Don't worry, no one suspects a thing. Yesterday, we did the train on this chick. I joined in, purely for professional reasons. Then we shot up speed. I had a paranoid incident, but I think I covered my tracks.~n~ Come meet me at the drug store in East Island City. I've got a plan.~n~ ~n~ Lester~n~ ~n~ * * * * * * * * * * * * * *~n~ Need a Private Investigator? Call 555-80085 and ease that suspicious mind.~n~

Huang,~n~ I'm an associate of your boss, Hsin. Hsin said you'd be able to help me. I need 10 bags of E so I can get close to these bikers. Hsin said you'd most likely get hold of these for me from Russian dealers in Hove Beach.~n~ ~n~ I'll be at the Burger Shot in Beechwood City. Don't forget to bring the merchandise.~n~ ~n~ Lester~n~ ~n~ * * * * * * * * * * * * * *~n~ Need a Private Investigator? Call 555-80085 and ease that suspicious mind.~n~Huang Lee,~n~ Like you, I am a rich and powerful man's son who has always struggled for an identity of their own, but after years of therapy has finally conquered their demons and is on top of the world.~n~ I love Kenny, but let's be quite frank, he's finished as a serious contender in this town.~n~ The race to replace Hsin, and become the new Triad boss, is between me and Zhou Ming now - and I'm Hsin's son - so it shouldn't take a genius to figure out who'll win!~n~ I'm wise, intelligent and the kind of man who sensibly confides in strangers, so I will make an excellent boss as I'm sure my father realizes.~n~ It's lucky for you, I like your moves. Maybe there's a future for you with me.~n~ I'll be at my garage in East Island City. Come and see me.~n~ ~n~ Your future friend and boss,~n~ Chan Jaoming.~n~

Huang,~n~ Being kidnapped never brings out the best in me. I was angry when I blamed you, but let's put it behind us - for friendship's sake. My therapist told me to apologize, so I will: I'm sorry.~n~ I'll be at my penthouse in East Holland. See you there? We can hang out and have fun and play beach volleyball together and make a montage video and set it to music and stuff, just like in the movies. I always do this with my friends, which may be why I haven't got many, because I always look better than them in the video.~n~ Yours,~n~ Chan Jaoming.~n~ ~n~ PS: I need your help pulling off a big drug deal.~n~
Huang,~n~ I've told my father all about you. He's looking forward to meeting you.~n~ ~n~ It's best not to keep him waiting.~n~ ~n~ See you soon.~n~ ~n~ Chan.~n~

Hey Huang,~n~ Now that many of Kenny's businesses are in my hands, you can officially think of me as your boss. But don't think of me as a boss. Think of me as a friend who's just quite a bit more important than you are.~n~ Maybe we should have a party to celebrate.~n~ ~n~ Meet me at the Marina. I'll get some treats in.~n~ ~n~ Your friend,~n~ Chan.~n~

Huang,~n~ I need your help. I've already told my father that I've dealt with this matter personally, so you can't let me down! I'll see you at my garage.~n~ ~n~ Your Boss and best friend, Chan.~n~ ~n~ PS: Zhou thinks he's pretty cool getting off completely free while the rest of us suffer.~n~ That rat's working with the Feds, selling us out so he can take over!~n~

Huang,~n~ I'm sick and tired of waiting to be boss. My father's just holding me back, probably because he' s jealous as I'm so young and beautiful, just like the Greek play, Octopus.~n~ ~n~ Well, the party's over, Daddy - and I've got 8 legs. I know what I have to do to become the boss now. - marry my mom and stab out my own eyes. No, only joking.~n~ ~n~ Come and see me. I'll be at Videogeddon. I've got a really clever plan.~n~ ~n~ Your Boss and BFF,~n~ Chan.~n~Huang,~n~ I've got a plan that should draw the assassins out of their hiding hole.~n~ ~n~ Come and see me at my place in Industrial.~n~ ~n~ Heston.~n~ ~n~ PS: If you need a place to stay that's local, feel free to use my old safe house in South Bohan.~n~

Huang,~n~ That the Korean Midtown Gangsters haven't put some heavy killers on you tells me we're probably shooting wide of the mark.~n~ I've got a feeling their gang may have some issues within it. I've been doing some digging but we need to get more reliable info.~n~ ~n~ Come and see me.~n~ ~n~ Heston.~n~

Huang,~n~ Planting the bug was supposed to have been the dangerous part of that mission, but I had it easy thanks to your fireworks.~n~ ~n~ You're one crazy son of a bitch, Huang. I'm starting to like you.~n~ ~n~ Heston.~n~

Huang,~n~ Framing that Korean gangbanger has severely depleted my personal stash.~n~ I need you to get hold of 2 bags of coke and bring them over as soon as possible. I usually get mine off the Angels of Death in Willis.~n~ It's purely for recreational purposes, of course. My wife left me. I'm kind of a tragic figure. They should make a movie about me: A sad, corrupt cop with a drug problem. I'm one of a kind!~n~ ~n~ Heston.~n~

Huang,~n~ I was right. There is a bunch of assassins operating as a small secretive group inside the main gang. They call themselves the Wonsu Nodong. They're pretty serious operators.~n~ I'm pretty sure they know someone is on to them.~n~ ~n~ Come and see me.~n~ ~n~ Heston.~n~
I knew the Wonsu assassins were onto us. My squad and I are surrounded near the toll booths in Steinway.~n~ Get over here NOW!~n~ ~n~ Hes.~n~
Huang,~n~ I've got great news, buddy. Come and see me. I'll be in Easton.~n~ ~n~ Heston.~n~

Huang,~n~ Firstly, sorry about my threats when we spoke. I was all over the place. It's tough breaking the habits of a life time.~n~ Secondly, great work!~n~ ~n~ As soon as my contact gives me the rat's name I'll email you.~n~ ~n~ Heston.~n~

Huang,~n~ It's not what you know, it's who you know: My contact in the FIB is gonna give us the name of the rat who's selling out the Triads.~n~ All he wants in return is help on a couple of legally 'sensitive' jobs.~n~ ~n~ See you at the gas station in Lancaster.~n~ ~n~ Heston.~n~

Huang,~n~ When you've finished taking out that boat, get over to Colony Island.~n~ Zhou's guys managed to land some contraband there earlier. My FIB contact wants all of that shit gone, so you'd better deal with it.~n~ ~n~ Thanks man,~n~ Heston.~n~
Huang,~n~ IAD are causing me major problems.~n~ Meet me at the Middle Park East diner, pronto.~n~ ~n~ Your sober, frightened and miserable pal,~n~ ~n~ Heston.~n~

Huang,~n~ I hear those dangerous idiots at the FIB have a friendly voice giving them the inside track on your boss, making life awkward for all of you. Huang,~n~ IAD has scared off my Fed contact.~n~ Don't worry, we can still get the rat's name.~n~ ~n~ Come and see me. I'm in Purgatory ... literally!~n~ ~n~ Heston.~n~
Huang,~n~ Well done, buddy. I've got the encrypted file.~n~ ~n~ Lose any heat you have, then come meet me. I should have it decoded real soon.~n~ ~n~ Heston.~n~

Nephew,~n~ That restaurant manager has just been complaining about the quality of service we provide.~n~ As he is a man who likes to piss into his customers' drinks, I found his choice of words a little confusing.~n~ Nonetheless, we cannot tolerate this kind of humiliation.~n~ ~n~ Come right over!~n~ ~n~ Yours,~n~ Uncle Kenny.~n~

Nephew,~n~ I hope you're enjoying yourself, bleeding me dry in that apartment I am paying for.~n~ I myself am experiencing rather dire cash flow problems. I need your help. Please visit me as soon as you can.~n~ ~n~ Yours,~n~ Uncle Kenny.~n~

Nephew,~n~ You have shown yourself to be a formidable entrepreneur in the pharmaceutical and healthcare business. Your father would be proud.~n~ ~n~ Keep it up. I've got my eye on a property in East Island City, and I'll need you to raise $5000 so we can secure the lease on it.~n~ We're going places, Huang! I'm proud of you.~n~ ~n~ Your loving uncle,~n~ Kenny.~n~

Nephew,~n~ How are you?~n~ I'm struggling. Your aunt is giving me hell. She accuses me of being a power crazed, sex maniac. She understands so little about men.~n~ Anyway, I'm closing the deal on that property in East Island City. Have you raised the money we need?~n~ Bring the $5000 to the warehouse as soon as you can.~n~ ~n~ Best,~n~ Uncle Kenny.~n~

Nephew,~n~ Well done Huang! You have dealt our true enemy a crippling blow.~n~ For the first time, I was truly proud to call you my nephew. Previously, I have just said I was proud, but really been sort of embarrassed by you, but not today!~n~ ~n~ Yours,~n~ Uncle Kenny.~n~ ~n~ PS: I don't think you recovered Yu Jian in this raid, clearly further raids will be necessary.~n~

Nephew,~n~ Those Korean kids, the Midtown Gangsters, have been friends of our family for years. Your incessant attacks on them must stop.~n~ They're now so weak that they are being threatened and defeated by several of the city's more unpleasant Italian families.~n~ For now, we must concentrate our efforts on our most virulent enemies: those moronic Spanish Lords.~n~ ~n~ Yours,~n~ Uncle Kenny.~n~

Nephew,~n~ Unbelievable! Hsin is now engaged in peace talks with certain Italian irritants. There's even talk of us 'working' together. Do I look like I like pizza? And yes, that is a racial stereotype, and no, I don't give a fuck. I'm pissed off.~n~ These are the same mobsters that are mopping up territory with Zhou and Chan that was left vacant by your crippling and frankly bizarre assaults on those Koreans.~n~ What the fuck were you thinking? Who had got it into your tiny mind that this was a good idea?~n~ ~n~ Uncle Kenny.~n~

Nephew,~n~ Your work with those Italian assholes has pleased Hsin. However, he is less than pleased that we haven't yet recovered Yu Jian. Quite a demanding old goat, isn't he? I love him!~n~ He has punished me by giving some of my holdings and businesses to Chan and Zhou. It would make me want to kill and maim and scream in rage less if I didn't KNOW that one of those cunts set me up. But we must find proof before we act. And act I will. I can be very vengeful. I often torture my pets. My wife hates me.~n~ The destiny of our family is in your hands, Nephew. Don't be like your dad - don't fuck this up. ~n~ Uncle Kenny.~n~ ~n~ PS: In order to keep a better eye on Chan and Zhou, I have a small place in Lower Easton you are welcome to use.~n~

Nephew,~n~ Hsin's patience with you has seemingly run out. As far as he's concerned you ARE the Fed rat.~n~ His men are under orders to kill you on sight. It doesn't look good.~n~ ~n~ Meet me at the Libertonian Museum. I have a plan. And don't say I haven't got your back.~n~ ~n~ Uncle Kenny.~n~

Huang,~n~ I have restored your honorable standing: There will be no more lingering doubts over your loyalty.~n~ ~n~ Though all the Tongs are behind us, finishing off the traitorous Chan and Zhou will be no easy task, as both of them have groups of allies. Probably best we do the honorable thing and kill all of them.~n~ ~n~ Good Luck.~n~ Boss Wu Lee.~n~

Nephew,~n~ This is urgent! I will use a lot of exclamation marks in the hope you get my point!!! The Feds are conducting raids on all of our operations. It's an unbelievable liberty!~n~ ~n~ They seem to know our every move before we make it. Even Chan Jaoming has been arrested! Thank god. I hope someone gives him a good jailhouse welcome. Little prick.~n~ ~n~ Someone MUST be ratting us all out.~n~ ~n~ Go to Hsin's penthouse in Little Italy. He'll know what to do.~n~ ~n~ Yours,~n~ Uncle Kenny.~n~ ~n~ PS: I don't suppose you uncovered any leads about Yu Jian through Zhou or Chan yet? Come on, I need that thing badly.~n~

Nephew,~n~ Hsin wants to meet you at the Amusement Park after you've completed your mission.~n~ Be careful: He's eliminating all those he suspects of treachery, and he's an angry and hypocritical old goat.~n~ ~n~ I will try to be there before you arrive.~n~ ~n~ Uncle Kenny.~n~

Huang,~n~ It is as I suspected. The traitor Chan is about to flee his rat-hole, and leave the city. This cannot be allowed to happen. He must pay for his crimes.~n~ ~n~ The Tongs remember Hsin's oath: The traitor's life was forfeit, no matter whom he was found to be.~n~ ~n~ I will send some men to aid you. A trapped rat can be dangerous.~n~ ~n~ Boss Wu Lee.~n~
Nephew,~n~ While Hsin has you running errands for the mob, it might be worth your while using one our old safe houses near Spanish Lords territory in Northwood.~n~ ~n~ Yours,~n~ Uncle Kenny.~n~

Nephew,~n~ I hope you're relaxing and enjoying yourself in this fine city. I'm sick with worry for the future of my family, but I don't mean to worry you.~n~ It appears that the rich fool you hijacked used to own an apartment in Lancaster. I found the keys in his van. With him now out of business, perhaps you should make use of it?~n~ I am really feeling the expense of putting you up in that first place, and you've not been exactly forward with the rent, have you?~n~ ~n~ Yours,~n~ Uncle Kenny.~n~I've heard there's to be a big meeting of the Midtown Gangsters taking place today at a safe house.~n~ We must discover its location, then we will see how loyal these Korean fucks are to me.~n~ ~n~ Meet me in South Bohan.~n~ ~n~ Hsin Jaoming.~n~

The new leader of those disloyal Korean scumbags shows me no respect. Me! And to think all the respect I've allowed them to show me over the years. And now they want freedom? What do they think this is? America? I must know what their intentions are. Go to their safe-house and obtain whatever information you can.~n~ If they try to stop you, it will only be proof they have something to hide.~n~ ~n~ My men at Chase Point will accompany you, and should the Koreans' files incriminate anyone, including you - my men will ensure justice is swift.~n~ ~n~ Don't mess me around with this.~n~ Hsin Jaoming.~n~

I am informed that our former subordinates attacked you and my men when you peacefully asked to see their files.~n~ Their files held details of a huge arms shipment of which they're about to take delivery.~n~ ~n~ Meet me on Charge Island.~n~ ~n~ Hsin Jaoming.~n~

After careful examination of the files, I no longer believe that the Midtown Gangsters are a real long term threat to us, especially after we hit them so hard: nor do I suspect they harbor the Fed rat.~n~ You, on the other hand, have yet to seriously prove your innocence.~n~ ~n~ Meet me in Industrial, for a test.~n~ ~n~ Hsin Jaoming.~n~

There are two former allies I no longer trust, either of whom may have reasons to speak to the FIB on our 'behalf'.~n~ ~n~ 1. The Angels of Death: I have instructed a private investigator called Lester to infiltrate this gang - I told him to contact you.~n~ ~n~ 2. The Midtown Gangsters: They assure me they remain loyal, yet their main safe house is still unknown to me, and they have been a constant source of disruption and irritation. I will email you with further instructions regarding them soon.~n~ ~n~ Hsin Jaoming.~n~
I need to see you about something.~n~ ~n~ Do not keep me waiting.~n~ ~n~ Hsin Jaoming.~n~
Come and see me at once. ~n~ Hsin Jaoming.~n~

I never sanctioned you to work with anyone else! Your activities with D'Avanzo are derailing my truce with the Messina family. You're a liability. I don't like liabilities.~n~ ~n~ Unless you have good reason, cease all contact with him.~n~ ~n~ Hsin Jaoming.~n~

Come and see me at once.~n~ ~n~ Hsin Jaoming.~n~GXTMr. Lee,~n~ Do you think it's a coincidence that soon after the Triads and Mob start working together, the Triads got turned over by the Feds, but the Mob didn't?~n~ You've got a rat and I know who it is. Help me trap him and we'll all be better off.~n~ ~n~ Meet me at the cemetery in Steinway.~n~ ~n~ I'm genuine - I hope you are, too,~n~ Rudy D'Avanzo.~n~
Mr. Lee,~n~ Come see me. I'll be in North Holland.~n~ ~n~ Sincerely,~n~ Rudy D'Avanzo.~n~

Mr. Lee,~n~ We've got that thing you wanted. Drop by and pick up your copy.~n~ ~n~ See you in North Holland.~n~ ~n~ Sincerely,~n~ Rudy D'.~n~Hey Loser,~n~ Hope you're having fun playing soldier-boy. I've got what I came for, so dump that N.O.O.S.E. piece of shit, before the army has wet dreams over your crowd control technique, and draft you.~n~ ~n~ Xin.~n~

Hey, Loser.~n~ ~n~ I see you've been crowing to others about your achievements. Think your something special, eh? You're not.~n~ ~n~ You don't know me, but I work for Kenny too: one of his best.~n~ ~n~ Think of this as an opportunity to prove you're not all talk.~n~ ~n~ Come see me in Cerveza Heights, behind Kenny's place.~n~ ~n~ Xin.~n~

Loser,~n~ ~n~ The heat caught up with me after our job. Seems like you let me down... that's not a career first for you, huh?~n~ ~n~ As it stands, I'm screwed. You better get over here and help me out. I've taken down a few cops, but stopped a few rounds myself.~n~ ~n~ If you want your money, you'd better get here soon.~n~ ~n~ Xin.~n~Huang Lee,~n~ I was saddened to see your Uncle Kenny had backed out of the race to succeed Hsin. Now only Chan Jaoming and I contest the leadership.~n~ To truly rekindle your family's fortunes you should be working for me, not that fool Chan.~n~ ~n~ Meet me at my nightclub in East Island City. Bring 20 bags of weed as a down payment on your future - you'll get good prices from Jamaican dealers in Schottler.~n~ ~n~ Zhou Ming.~n~

Great news Huang!~n~ You managed to save enough stash cars for us to make a tidy sum today.~n~ As any fool would have anticipated, Hsin has expressed some displeasure with us meddling with his plans. Fear not - I'm very capable. I feigned ignorance and cut him into the profits.~n~ (Naturally, this only impacted your slice of the take, as it was my idea and ideas don't grow on trees).~n~ ~n~ You can thank me later.~n~ ~n~ Zhou Ming.~n~

Huang,~n~ After all I've done for Hsin he still fails to favor me as his replacement. Huang,~n~ Join me at my Lower Easton residence, to continue your studies in the art of victory. Seriously, I've got a golden opportunity for us.~n~ Zhou.~n~

Huang,~n~ I hear that the moron Chan has already been released on bail. Strangely quick don't you think? I bet the pig squealed.~n~ ~n~ He should rot behind bars. It would be safer for all of us had he been properly organized and not wrecked on drugs, he wouldn't have been arrested in the first place.~n~ ~n~ If he's made boss, we're all screwed. Huang, don't be a fuck up. I know I can be a bit full on, but I understand this town.~n~ ~n~ Visit me soon.~n~ Zhou.~n~

This medicinal herb and religious sacrament has wafted down through time on a tendril of arcane smoke from prehistory, so that users can chill out and learn to play the sitar.
This powerful hypnotic agent kills anxiety dead in its tracks. It could even help the user sleep their way into believing the American dream.
The user will get loved up, grinning, gurning and dancing their tits off, until paranoia, anxiety and confusion tell them to get the hell home.
These get the user turned on and tuned in, taking them on a flashback trip to the psychedelic 60's ...they'll hear the color and see the smell of their own vomit. Trippy man!
The user will feel the initial powerful rush, then slide down the slick warm walls of oblivion... forever. The methadone queue just got longer.
Taking this, the user will walk the line with the Vinewood stars; partying like a God with their new best friend... to the exclusion of all else.

Select items to trade. Select the ready button on the widget bar when ready to trade.
This is the scroll bar. Touch it and slide up or down to scroll.~n~ ~n~TIP: You can also touch and slide up or down on the lower screen without using the scroll bar.
This is your PDA desktop and Application icons. Swipe left or right to browse through them and touch the middle Application icon to open it. Touch ~#FF25~ to exit.

These are your Shortcuts that also appear on the HUD in game for quick access to various Applications.~n~~n~TIP: You can customize these shortcuts by touching and holding the middle Application icon momentarily before sliding it on top of an existing shortcut to replace it.
These are your Emails. The associated mail icon indicates read, unread and important Emails. Tap an Email to open it.~n~ ~n~TIP: You can also swipe right on an Email to open it.
This is the Filter button for filtering your Inbox so you can choose to view Emails from a single sender.
This is the main body of an Email. Large Emails can be scrolled by sliding the screen up or down.~n~ ~n~TIP: You can swipe left to quickly return to your Inbox.
This is the Filter List. Touch a sender in the list to filter out all Emails from other senders. Touching "All" from the list will cancel the filter.
This is your Contacts list. Touch a Contact to display their details.
Touch this Basket button to review items you have just ordered and checkout.
This is a list of weapon Categories. Touch and slide up or down to scroll the list. Touch a Category to open it.
This is a list of the weapons within this category. Special offer items are marked with a '$' symbol.~n~ ~n~TIP: Some weapons are only available to "Fully Cocked" customers with an account upgrade.

Touch the associated price button to add the weapon to your Basket, provided you have enough money and it is currently in stock. Your current funds will be displayed.~n~ ~n~TIP: You can purchase more ammo by adding extra quantities of the same weapon to your Basket.

This is a summary of all the items you have currently added to your Basket. You can remove items from the Basket by touching the associated "X" icon. Touch the Checkout button to order these weapons for the price shown.
The map can be moved by touching and sliding in any direction.
Touching this button will center the map on your current position or your GPS destination.
Touch this icon to access a list of all the "Safehouses" in the city, including ones you haven't purchased yet.

Touch this button to access all the "Drug Dealer" locations you have found.
Touch this icon to access the "Points of Interest" within the city, such as Pay 'n' Spray garages and mission locations.
Touch this icon to access your "Favorites" list where you can store custom locations that you may want to revisit.
Touch this icon to toggle your GPS route on or off.~n~~n~TIP: You can also toggle the GPS route in-game by holding down on the Radar.
Touch an item in the list to highlight it on the upper screen map. Touching the associated Distance button will plot a GPS route for you.

If you have a custom Waypoint active, you can touch "+" to add its location as a new Favorite. If you already have Favorites stored, you can touch the associated Distance button to plot a GPS route or touch the associated "X" icon to remove it.~n~~n~TIP: Place a custom Waypoint by quickly touching the Zoomed map twice.
